00021 #ifndef TRIQS_UTILITY_PARAMS_DEFAULT_H
00022 #define TRIQS_UTILITY_PARAMS_DEFAULT_H
00023 #include "./opaque_object_h5.hpp"
00024 namespace triqs { namespace utility {
00032  class parameter_defaults {
00033   public :
00034    parameter_defaults() {};
00035    parameter_defaults (parameter_defaults const & other) = default;
00036    parameter_defaults (parameter_defaults && other) { swap(*this,other);}
00037    parameter_defaults & operator =  (parameter_defaults const & other)  = default;
00038    parameter_defaults & operator =  (parameter_defaults && other) noexcept { swap(*this,other); return *this;}
00039    friend void swap(parameter_defaults & a, parameter_defaults &b) 
00040    { swap(a.object_map,b.object_map); swap(a.documentation, b.documentation);swap(a.is_optional, b.is_optional);  }
00041 
00042   private:
00043    typedef std::map<std::string, _object> map_t;
00044    map_t object_map;
00045    std::map<std::string, std::string> documentation;
00046    std::map<std::string, bool > is_optional;
00047 
00048    friend class boost::serialization::access;
00049    template<class Archive>
00050     void serialize(Archive & ar, const unsigned int version) { ar & TRIQS_MAKE_NVP("object_map",object_map); }
00051 
00052    template<typename T> parameter_defaults & insert(std::string const & key, T && def_val, std::string const & doc, bool opt) {
00053     object_map[key] = std::forward<T>(def_val);
00054     documentation[key] = doc;
00055     is_optional[key] = opt;
00056     return *this;
00057    }
00058 
00059    template<typename T> const T getter(std::map<std::string,T> const & m, std::string const & key) const {
00060     auto it = m.find(key); assert(it !=m.end()); return it->second;
00061    }
00062 
00063   public:
00064 
00065    typedef map_t::const_iterator const_iterator;
00066    typedef map_t::iterator iterator;
00067    const_iterator begin() const { return object_map.begin();}
00068    const_iterator end()  const { return object_map.end();}
00069    iterator begin() { return object_map.begin();}
00070    iterator end() { return object_map.end();}
00071 
00072    bool has_key(std::string const & key) const { return object_map.find(key) != object_map.end();}
00073    bool is_required(std::string const & key) const { return (has_key(key) && (! getter(this->is_optional,key)));}
00074    std::string doc(std::string const & key) const { return (has_key(key) ? getter(this->documentation,key) : "");}
00075 
00078    template <typename T> parameter_defaults &optional(std::string const &key, T &&def_val, std::string const &doc) {
00079     insert(key, std::forward<T>(def_val), doc, true);
00080     return *this;
00081    }
00082 
00085    template <typename T> parameter_defaults &required(std::string const &key, T &&def_val, std::string const &doc) {
00086     insert(key, std::forward<T>(def_val), doc, false);
00087     return *this;
00088    }
00089 
00091    _object const & operator[](std::string const & key) const {
00092     auto it = object_map.find(key);
00093     if ( it== object_map.end()) TRIQS_RUNTIME_ERROR<<"Key : "<< key<< " not found";
00094     return it->second;
00095    }
00096 
00098    std::vector<std::vector<std::string>> generate_help() const;
00099 
00101    friend std::ostream & operator << (std::ostream & out, parameter_defaults const & p);
00102 
00103  };
00104 
00105 }}
00106 #endif
